about_the_game:
This is a prologue of the Hidden Series Game. In this Game all you need to do is focus on the items listed, tap on the hidden objects and complete the challenge in the best time. On completing a level it gives the gamer the chance to play the next level, Hidden Series 1 has 40 stupendous levels that has enthralling game play and levels with various genre. Take the brain teaser challenge and find the hidden objects as quickly as possible. Discover the unlimited fun of finding objects, highly replayable!

Features:
  • 40 Levels of Unlimited fun to find Hidden Objects (7 levels available in this prologue)
  • Best Timings and Best Clicks to keep this challenging with friends and family
  • Multi language support
  • Relaxing music to keep the players engaged in the object hunt
detailed_description:
This is a prologue of the Hidden Series Game. In this Game all you need to do is focus on the items listed, tap on the hidden objects and complete the challenge in the best time. On completing a level it gives the gamer the chance to play the next level, Hidden Series 1 has 40 stupendous levels that has enthralling game play and levels with various genre. Take the brain teaser challenge and find the hidden objects as quickly as possible. Discover the unlimited fun of finding objects, highly replayable!

Features:
  • 40 Levels of Unlimited fun to find Hidden Objects (7 levels available in this prologue)
  • Best Timings and Best Clicks to keep this challenging with friends and family
  • Multi language support
  • Relaxing music to keep the players engaged in the object hunt
name: Hidden Series Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Experience the engaging and addictive Hidden Series 1 game to find the hidden objects across 40 challenging levels. We have carefully crafted the puzzles which will give the ultimate challenges unlimited fun and allow you to relax.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
